attributes.action: Encourage Revenue & Customs to review fuel prices more than twice a year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The rate at which most employers will pay employees for business mileage is based on the Revenue & Customs guidelines, updated twice a year only, currently 11p/ mile, My car does 40mpg so for a 40 mile journey I get £4:40 but the diesel costs me £5:40/gallon
